titles.title: Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued by the United States Postal Service honoring Hattie McDaniel, and that the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee should recommend to the Postmaster General that such a stamp be issued.

Expressing the sense of Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued by the United States Postal Service honoring Hattie McDaniel, and that the Citizens' Stamp Advisory Committee should recommend to the Postmaster General that such a stamp be issued.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Expresses the sense of Congress that a postage stamp should be issued to honor Hattie McDaniel (an African-American pioneer in the entertainment industry).
